abstract: The array of colors for the file labels.
overview:
## Return Value

An array of `NSColor` objects.

## Discussion

This array has the same number of elements as [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWorkspace/fileLabels], and the color at a given index corresponds to the label at the same index.

You can listen for notifications named [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWorkspace/didChangeFileLabelsNotification] to be notified when file labels change that may result in changes to the order of the `fileLabelColors`.

You can safely call this method from any thread of your app.

# fileLabelColors

**Instance Property**

The array of colors for the file labels.

## Declaration

```swift
var fileLabelColors: [NSColor] { get }
```

## Return Value

An array of `NSColor` objects.

## Discussion

This array has the same number of elements as [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWorkspace/fileLabels], and the color at a given index corresponds to the label at the same index.

You can listen for notifications named [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWorkspace/didChangeFileLabelsNotification] to be notified when file labels change that may result in changes to the order of the `fileLabelColors`.

You can safely call this method from any thread of your app.

## Finder File Labels

- **fileLabels**: The array of file labels, returned as strings.
